meanings.definition: To fasten or secure with a thumbtack.
meanings.sent1: She thumbtacked the poster to the wall.
meanings.sent2: He always thumbtacked his notes to the corkboard.
meanings.sent3: The cat thumbtacked its toy mouse to the carpet.
meanings.sent4: The idea of starting a new project thumbtacked her attention.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her first concert was thumbtacked in her mind.

meanings.definition: Having been fastened or secured with a thumbtack.
meanings.sent1: The thumbtacked papers fluttered in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The notice on the bulletin board was thumbtacked in place.
meanings.sent3: The thumbtacked photo looked slightly crooked on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her thumbtacked drawing stood out among the others.
meanings.sent5: The thumbtacked sign caught everyone's eye.
